content: I'll explore the Metropolis on my own.
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_
大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_
大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content: Just point me in the right direction!
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
Be careful there, the Metropolis is still under construction,
<size=30>and we've been experiencing some severe Maelstroms lately.</size>
By the way, if you're not familiar with the route, would you like me to guide you?
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
At ten o'clock from the plaza,
you'll find the offices of Loomi Co. and Parade Station.
For some reason, it feels a bit intimidating...
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
By the way, Hein Road is currently hosting a Fishing event,
it's a popular Astralink stop.
So, which Astralink would you like to take?
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
At two o'clock from the plaza,
you'll find the pilot Astralink autonomous zone!
After all, the Metropolis is where all the Astralinks connect together—
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
Of course, you'll see us around here everywhere—
We may be Navigators, but we love nothing more than a good chat...
So if you forget anything, feel free to ask us!
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
That's why our liaisons and Neighbors
love to conduct public affairs here,
like hosting concerts, sports events, and all sorts of activities!
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
Oh, it's Astralink passenger Aje!
I'm Amirage, the navigator here at Central Station.
Is this your first time visiting the Metropolis?
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
See you next time!
My friend in the sky! Remember,
whenever you need to reach any destination along the Sky River, I'm here to help!
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
Though you can only faintly see its outline now,
The Metropolis connects all the Astralinks together—
You could say all the exciting things in the universe can be found right here!
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
The Metropolis connects all Astralinks in the Sky River,
and a professional Amira~je navigator can take you
in any~direction along the Sky River's shores!
info: 大都会测试用：大都会车站NPC对话_

content:
Facing the plaza from the Central Station lies the shopping district,
where you'll find the Fashion Mall and Furniture Mall right along the street.
You can even buy specialties from different Bubble Worlds there!
